Text: Wasn't the original Childrens series French then shown in the UK with  new sound track?
download this for your kids, they'll love it :)
this isnt the lame rip knocking about with the wrong audio (woman describing every scene over the top of the movie) is it???
Yes, the original series was a french kids show, and each english episode was created from many snippets put together to with new stories dubbed over the top
Can we get a seed please? :) I actually watched the American "Doogal" and I need to get that horrid dialogue out of my head. Thanks.

Thanks to whoever seeded. ;) By the way, since I have a Magic Roundabout fansite and I like to help people see this film, I can reseed this file if anyone needs it. Just email me at sparky(at)theneitherworld.com (until such time as I comment I can't reseed anymore, anyways).
